org.usfirst.frc.team4564.robot

Class GearVision

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usfirst.frc.team4564.robot.GearVision

  • public class GearVision
extends java.lang.Object
    The Gear Vision autonomous subsystem. Auto-aligns a robot to the airship gear peg for FIRST Steamworks.
    Author:
    Brewer FIRST Robotics Team 4564, Evan McCoy, Wataru Nakata

      • rawDistance

        private double rawDistance()
        Returns the reported distance from the pi vision program.
        Returns:
        double the distance in inches.

      • rawSlide

        private double rawSlide()
        Returns the reported slide offset from the pi vision program.
        Returns:
        double a value from -1.0 to 1.0

      • rawTurn

        private int rawTurn()
        Returns the reported turn offset from the pi vision program.
        Returns:
        int a turn value from -5 to 5.
